entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
